net.bubbaland.trivia.server

Class TriviaServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bubbaland.trivia.server.TriviaServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.rmi.Remote, java.util.EventListener, TriviaInterface

    public class TriviaServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements TriviaInterface, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The main server that coordinates the trivia contest. The TriviaServer class contains the main method to start the trivia server and handles all interaction between the centralized Trivia data structure and remote clients. It also downloads the hourly standings from KVSC, parses them and adds them into the Trivia data structure. The class is also responsible for periodically saving the current Trivia state to an XML file and loading a previous state. The save files are stored in SAVE_DIR, which much exist on the server.
